sourcesContent:
import { Component } from '@angular/core'; import { Router } from '@angular/router'; @Component({ selector: 'app-login', templateUrl: './login.component.html', styleUrls: ['./login.component.css'] }) export class LoginComponent { constructor(private router: Router) { } email: string = "" password: string = "" login() { console.log("Email: ", this.email) console.log("Password: ", this.password) this.router.navigate(["/app"]) } }
